description: Borrowed from French masturbation, New Latin masturbātiō, masturbātiōnem. Equivalent to masturbate +‎ -ion.

entries.meaning: Manual erotic stimulation of the genitals or other erotic regions, often to orgasm, either by oneself or a partner.
examples: Masturbation is our first and natural form of sexual activity and if that's inhibited or damaged, then we suffer for the rest of our lives.(Betty Dodson)
